title: Kabuki: The Alchemy (Trade Paperback)
description:
Collecting all nine issues of the acclaimed, New York Times bestselling, Eisner Award-nominated KABUKI: THE ALCHEMY series from Marvel's creator-owned Icon imprint! Readers have been waiting to get the newest KABUKI story in paperback form, and this monster volume delivers with loads of extras - including the never-before-seen original ending sequence cut from the single issues, new pages of art, a presentation of the original scripts, remastered pages, new design pages, a commentary by the author, a "best of" letters section and more! A whopping 320 pages, this high-end paperback also features an introduction by Fight Club author Chuck Palahniuk.
Rated T  …$24.99 
ISBN: 978-0-7851-3250-9
